typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename',
	wildcardPaths:['UCI_data/']) ~> GermanDataSource
GermanDataSource parse({_col0_} = {_col0_} ? (col1 as string,
		col2 as integer,
		col3 as string,
		col4 as string,
		col5 as integer,
		col6 as string,
		col7 as string,
		col8 as integer,
		col9 as string,
		col10 as string,
		col11 as integer,
		col12 as string,
		col13 as integer,
		col14 as string,
		col15 as string,
		col16 as integer,
		col17 as string,
		col18 as integer,
		col19 as string,
		col20 as string,
		col21 as integer),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: ' ',
	nullValue: '') ~> Parse1
Parse1 derive(each({_col0_}, match(startsWith(name,'col')), $$+'_d' = $$)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		col1_d,
		col2_d,
		col3_d,
		col4_d,
		col5_d,
		col6_d,
		col7_d,
		col8_d,
		col9_d,
		col10_d,
		col11_d,
		col12_d,
		col13_d,
		col14_d,
		col15_d,
		col16_d,
		col17_d,
		col18_d,
		col19_d,
		col20_d,
		col21_d
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
